actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit discrimination on account of sex or marital status individuals seeking credit.

summary.text: Equal Consumer Credit Act - Prohibits discrimination on account of sex or marital status against individuals seeking credit. Prescribes fines for specified categories of violations of this Act and costs, together with a reasonable attorney's fee, of any successful action to enforce a liability under this Act, to be assessed against the liable party.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit discrimination on account of sex or marital status individuals seeking credit.
